articles.description: A new trailer for the animated DC League of Super-Pets film shows the squad of superpowered pets get their powers and save the Justice League from guinea pig villainess Lulu
articles.content: A squad of shelter pets led by Krypto the Superdog

articles.author: Alesia Stanford
articles.title: Meg Ryan, 60, teams up with David Duchovny, 61, for rom-com What Happens Later - Daily Mail
articles.description: Meg Ryan will reclaim her title as a rom-com queen in her latest role, returning to the big screen in What Happens Later which is described as an 'evolved and nostalgic' take on romantic comedy.
articles.content:
Sleepless In Seattle actress Meg Ryan may be able to reclaim her title as a romantic comedy queen in her latest role.

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Avatar 2’s first trailer needs fewer Na’vi and more Pandora - Polygon
articles.description: Avatar: The Way of Water’s first trailer brings back Sam Worthington and Zoe Saldaña, while introducing Kate Winslet to the world of Pandora and the Na’vi. Avatar 2 has a release date of Dec. 16, 2022.
